name: They call Me Kobra Prototype
description:
Hello, Mellborry here

I'm introducing that I started to work on my new game, called They Call Me "Kobra"

This game is a kind of sequel to my previous game, KOBRUN. But I want to make it a full-fledged game, with story, levels and addicting gameplay. KOBRUN for sure turned out bad because I literally speedrunned the development. And I got an idea to make a good sequel.

This is the early prototype. In it I worked out the movement and physics of the character, to make the game feel more alive. Currently there's no enemies, but there are four easter eggs, try to find them! Some of them were made by my friends.

All sound effects were taken from zapsplat.com

Got any suggestions? Feel free to comment!

Have a nice day
